title: Celsius set to vote on asset sale plan after court approves disclosures
description:
Celsius Network is set to vote on its plan to offload assets to the Fahrenheit consortium after securing court approval for its disclosure statement and voting plan on Aug. 17. The court approval highlights the climax of Celsius’ year-long journey from bankruptcy, navigating through tumultuous crypto market shifts and the arrest of its former CEO, […]

The post Celsius set to vote on asset sale plan after court approves disclosures appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BRICS Bank Could Issue Digital Currency for the Economic Bloc, Analyst Says
description: A Trace Finance analyst has suggested that the BRICS nations could launch a single digital currency issued and regulated by the New Development Bank, also known as the BRICS Bank. He stressed that the U.S. is facing the biggest crisis in history. Many expect a common BRICS currency that would challenge the dominance of the […]
